Reviews.Title: “nice stay, great location”
Reviews.Author: VasiaAthens
Reviews.Content: spent 4 nights hotel mirage booked caroline suite offered bigger hotel mirage clean furniture bathroom breakfast nice offering reception staff friendly helpful apart person polite guests location super termini station window literally 1 minute walk hotel course walk attractions stay

Reviews.Title: “Crap”
Reviews.Author: xxSB
Reviews.Content: cold night blankets sheets wtf breakfeast boring tasting ran simply didnt refill plates staff unkind sigh beds uncomfortable location

Reviews.Title: “Good value for money”
Reviews.Author: mllece
Reviews.Content: paid 55 euros double bathroom value money average definitely cold theres lift luggage safe hotel situated close terravision bus stop termini station taxi ride piazza navona 12 euros night

Reviews.Title: “Nice and comfort hotel”
Reviews.Author: d95
Reviews.Content: conveniently located train station noise refrigerator bathtub aircondition excelent hotel stuff nice helpful specially thank lady owner friendly breakfast fine excellent value money convenient location termini station close attractions city rome hotel clean staff polite helpful efficient superb location arriving train airport bus ciampino na termini metra ciampino od ich

Reviews.Title: “The Most Unfriendly Owner”
Reviews.Author: kamaya62
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel night husband ok planning stay 2 3 morning step son joined register owner reception day started scream claiming luggage checking poor english allow understand register claimed hotel ready money packing staff kept saying stepson customers recommend plenty hotels rome staff

Reviews.Title: “Very good price very good hotel”
Reviews.Author: angelina70london
Reviews.Content: am happy services hotel clean nice bar services drink cheap price people front desk nice information tours yes

HotelInfo.Name: Hotel Mirage
HotelInfo.Address: Via Milazzo 4/6, 185 Rome, Italy
